TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Implicit Value-Ranges - Invalid Domain Value Range
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Check if the systems verifies the number ranges according MIM attributes minInclusive, minExclusive, maxInclusive, maxExclusive
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Send objects with values greater or smaller as the defined range according MIM attributes .
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The nations Gateway and the TT are ready to connect and have a physical connection with each other. Also the SOAP connection is established and ready for transport.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success the Gateway remains stable and handles all messages correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The nation loads MIP4SLT2.5_2407_a into their C2 system (2) through the TT (1). This file includes a radiological event with value -1 for an attribute with minIncl=0 according MIM.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The system reports correctly the invalid value.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The nation loads MIP4SLT2.5_2407_b into their C2 system (2) through the TT (1). This file includes a radiological event with value 101 for an attribute with maxIncl=100 according MIM.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The system reports correctly the invalid value.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The nation loads MIP4SLT2.5_2407_c into their C2 system (2) through the TT (1). This file includes a radiological event with value 100 for an attribute with maxIncl=100 according MIM.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The system displays correctly the object.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The nation loads MIP4SLT2.5_2407_d into their C2 system (2) through the TT (1). This file includes a radiological event with value 0 for an attribute with minIncl=0 according MIM.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The system displays correctly the object.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The nation loads MIP4SLT2.5_2407_e into their C2 system (2) through the TT (1). This file includes a nuclear weapon event with value 0 for an attribute with minExcl=0 according MIM.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The system reports correctly the invalid value.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The nation loads MIP4SLT2.5_2407_f into their C2 system (2) through the TT (1). This file includes an instrument landing system with value 180 for an attribute with maxExcl=180 according MIM.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The system reports correctly the invalid value.
